snippet: Mexican officials say federal police have arrested a man suspected of leading a drug cartel that moved 76 tons of cocaine into the U.S. between 2000 and 2003....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Arrests Suspected Capo Wanted in New York
headline.main: Mexico Arrests Suspected Capo Wanted in New York

lead_paragraph: Mexican officials say federal police have arrested a man suspected of leading a drug cartel that moved 76 tons of cocaine into the U.S. between 2000 and 2003.
